Config.Resource: SELECT c.OUID, p.CODE PROVINCE_CODE, p.LABEL PROVINCE_LABEL, c.CODE, c.LABEL, c.LEVEL, c.LOCATION_LONGITUDE, c.LOCATION_LATITUDE FROM DT_COM_CITY c LEFT JOIN DT_COM_PROVINCE p ON c.PROVINCE_ID = p.OUID WHERE IFNULL(c.LOCATION_LONGITUDE, 0) > 0 AND IFNULL(c.LOCATION_LATITUDE, 0) > 0 ORDER BY c.CODE
